# Task

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.



# Data

pig_latinify(["hello", "apple", "strong", "world"])

```julia
function pig_latinify(words)
    threaded_results = Vector{String}(undef, length(words))
    @threads for i in eachindex(words)
        word = words[i]
        if word[1] == 'a' || word[1] == 'e' || word[1] == 'i' || word[1] == 'o' || word[1] == 'u'
            threaded_results[i] = word * "way"
        else
            first_letter = word[1]
            rest_of_word = word[2:end]
            threaded_results[i] = rest_of_word * first_letter * "ay"
        end
    end
    return threaded_results
end

pig_latinify(["hello", "apple", "strong", "world"]) # Output: ["helloway", "appleway", "strongtay", "worlday"]
```
